description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Can you master inertia to dodge and shoot rocks, pick up supplies and escape sneaky missiles in 3d? Featuring challenging levels and beautiful space sceneries, Asteroid Sharp Shooter suits both relaxed players and hardcore gamers. Play with or against up to 3 of your friends in split screen for additional fun.
